settings.sale_popup_description: Dear valued customers We like to say thank you for your business this year due to this we are taking a well deserved break up until the 4th January. Until then we are operating with limited staff which will try get back to your enquires and questions as soon as possible. Thank you all again for this year and we wish you a merry and prosperous new year. Kind regards My Jewel World Team

settings.title: Fast Shipping
settings.text: We aim to dispatch all jewellery within 24 working hours of receiving your order. If we're unable to dispatch your order within this time frame we'll give you an estimated date within 24 normal business hours.

settings.title: Order Track
settings.text: Here at My Jewel World our UK delivery is fast, free, tracked and insured.

settings.title: Return Policy
settings.text: We offer free* UK returns, refunds and exchanges on all of our jewellery for up to 31 days after you’ve received your item.

settings.title: BEAUTIFUL PACKAGING
settings.text: At My Jewel World each item is hand-packed with care and attention. We send all our orders discreetly so no ones surprises are spoiled. Our boxes are specially designed to complement and protect the jewellery they house. We provide everything you need to ensure you never forget that special moment when giving your gift

settings.title: PERSONALISED GIFT CARDS
settings.text: Personalise and write your own message on one of our luxury gift cards. Just simply tell us what you'd like to say an we'll do the rest

settings.title: Up to 75% off bricks and mortar shops:
settings.text: Yes, this is correct as we deal with all the top diamond manufacturers in the world you can rest assured that our prices are very competitive. Plus we do all our own manufacturing in house using some of the industries cutting edge technologies.

settings.title: Custom Designs:
settings.text: Want to add a more personal touch to your engagement then this is the one for you. We design your engagement ring or piece of jewellery in our CAD software once finalised we send you a life style image of your ring for final approval before we start to make your engagement ring or piece of jewellery this service could take up to 5 weeks so bear this in mind.

settings.title: Save time:
settings.text: Use this to answer some common questions you hear from your customers. You could discuss product details, size fit, shipping policies, or anything you think would help merchants make an informed decision about your products. This section will appear across all products.

settings.title: Lifetime Guarantee:
settings.text: We guarantee there will be no craftsmanship faults with your item. This does not include everyday wear and tear.

settings.title: Free Shipping:
settings.text: We will ship free of charge anywhere in the UK.

We offer a lifetime guarantee on any manufacturing faults with our products. We do this because each piece made goes through a rigorous testing and checking before being shipped out to our customers. If you believe your item is damaged due to a manufacturing fault, you may return for inspection. If we believe your merchandise is damaged due to a manufacturing fault, then we will repair your item or, if we deem appropriate, replace the item. If we find that the item damaged is not caused by a manufacturing defect, then we will notify you and let you know how much to repair or replace the item. Please note that slight irregularities and variations in craftsmanship or natural characteristics, or internal inclusions, visible or otherwise, in coloured gemstones are unique and individual to each item. These characteristics are considered as part of the character of the item, and should not be considered a defect.

settings.title: Beautiful Packaging
settings.text: At My Jewel World each item is hand-packed with care and attention. We send all our orders discreetly so no ones surprises are spoiled. Our boxes are specially designed to complement and protect the jewellery they house. We provide everything you need to ensure you never forget that special moment when giving your gift
